DOC.brief_summary: This observational study will evaluate the safety, efficacy, characteristics of patients, characteristics of physicians and quality of life in patients who are prescribed OZURDEX® as treatment for non-infectious uveitis of the posterior segment of the eye in France.
DOC.brief_title: Ozurdex® in Patients With Non-infectious Uveitis Affecting the Posterior Segment of the Eye
DOC.criteria: Patient with noninfectious uveitis affecting the posterior segment of the eye. Patient not residing in metropolitan France.
